Reviews.Title: erroneous specifications
Reviews.Author: Daniel Esteban
Reviews.Content: I feel cheated by the seller to buy a kit garmin camera 429.99 and have only sent me the camera with the cleaning kit and that sontiene camera if other accessories were missing please inform as I do get the other accessories

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Sami
Reviews.Content: Product was received as advertised although there were a lot of items in the package that were not necessary.  Better of buying the cam alone and adding what you need.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David Ostrowe
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new toy.  I wish the kit came with more brackets.  I ended up buying another $25 worth of brackets.
